item.title: How to test a Moon landing from Earth
item.description: The world is racing to land on the Moon. How do space agencies and commercial companies test their landers ahead of time?

item.title: Toxic Culture Is Driving the Great Resignation
item.description: Research using employee data reveals the top five predictors of attrition and four actions managers can take in the short term to reduce attrition.

item.title: Why furniture got so bad
item.description: Furniture used to last generations. Now it barely survives a move. Industry insiders explain.

item.title: 6 Ways Trees Benefit All of Us
item.description: From a city park to a vast forest, trees deliver for us when we help them thrive.

item.title: It's Time for an RSS Revival
item.description: After years of letting algorithms make up our minds for us, the time is right to go back to basics.
